about_the_game:
War in Heaven?

War In Heaven takes what you know from the classic bullet-hell genre and introduces a dynamically changing arena that forces you to be constantly vigilant. It is a short game focused on highly polished twin-stick shooter combat between you and your enemy. The enemy will try to corner you in the heat of battle so you must use your wits and battle instincts to stay one step ahead, or risk death.

Gameplay

  • Touhou + Furi, Bullet-hell Boss Rush gameplay!
  • Short, highly polished classic twin-stick shooter action
  • The enemy will try to corner you in the dynamically changing arena
  • Get yourself out in a pinch using the bomb.

Features

  • Fight different bosses, each with multiple phases.
  • Multiple difficulties for the newcomers, or for the trained!

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics Family
  • DirectX: Version 12

  • Additional Notes: It just needs to be able to run pixels.
